class.name: PathExtrudeProfileCircle
class.brief_description: A resource to define circular extrusion profiles for [PathExtrude3D] nodes.
class.description: This resource defines the parameters for the [PathExtrude3D] node to extrude a full or partial circular shape along its path.

members.member: If true, any circle defined with less than [code]TAU[/code] sweep will have an extra flat face to close the mesh.
The angle in which the profile sweep will stop.
The distance from the center to the edges of the swept circle.
The number of line segments to use when constructing the circle.
The angle in which the profile sweep will begin.
